thread.title: Sharon
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: I would like to express my appreciation to Jackie Stanley for not only advising me on the best coarse of action to take in getting me out of the financial mess that I got myself into, but for also caring and understanding. She has shown me that there are people in this business that care about their clients and that made such a huge difference on how I was able to cope with the decisions I had to make. She is professional, courteous and is an excellent listener. Thanks so much for all your help, support and advise!
